_description: Poem expressing welcome to pain — two stanzas rhyme royal

BLRoyApp58.First Lines:
When fortune had me A vaunsydvnto the grace of my swete
                    creatureand that hure trothe to me was fyauncyd…
BLRoyApp58.Last Lines:
…and syth that your loue I may not attaynefare well plesure
                    & welcum payne
BLRoyApp58.Editions:
Flügel,  Ewald. 
             “Liedersammlungen des XVI Jahrhunderts, Besonders aus der Zeit Heinrichs
                VIII.” 
             Anglia
         12 (1889): 225-72, 585-97: 267.
